original_text: This went on for two years, so that all the Jews and Greeks who lived in the province of Asia heard the word of the Lord.
korean_text: 두 해 동안 이같이 하니 아시아에 사는 자는 유대인이나 헬라인이나 다 주의 말씀을 듣더라

sentences.original_text: This went on for two years
so that all the Jews and Greeks
who lived in the province of Asia
heard the word of the Lord
